import { Canvas, Meta, Story } from "@storybook/addon-docs";
import useDisableScroll from "..";
import { FunctionArgument, FunctionArguments, UsageGuidelines } from "../../../storybook";

<Meta title="Hooks/useDisableScroll" />

# useDisableScroll

- [Overview](#overview)
- [Returns](#returns)
- [Usage](#usage)
- [Feedback](#feedback)

## Overview
Use this hook to disable scroll for element.

<Canvas>
  <Story name="Overview">
    {() => {
        const { disableScroll, enableScroll } = useDisableScroll(".scrollable");
        return (
            <div>
                <button onClick={disableScroll}>Disable Scroll</button>
                <button onClick={enableScroll}>Enable Scroll</button>
                <div className="scrollable" style={{ height: "200px", width: "500px", overflow: "auto" }}>
                    <p>Scrollable Content</p>
                    <p>Scrollable Content</p>
                    <p>Scrollable Content</p>
                    <p>Scrollable Content</p>
                    <p>Scrollable Content</p>
                    <p>Scrollable Content</p>
                    <p>Scrollable Content</p>
                    <p>Scrollable Content</p>
                    <p>Scrollable Content</p>
                    <p>Scrollable Content</p>
                    <p>Scrollable Content</p>
                    <p>Scrollable Content</p>
                    <p>Scrollable Content</p>
                    <p>Scrollable Content</p>
                    <p>Scrollable Content</p>
                    <p>Scrollable Content</p>
                </div>
            </div>
        );
    }}
  </Story>
</Canvas>

## Returns

<FunctionArguments>
    <FunctionArgument name="disableScroll" type="function" description="Call this function to disable scroll." />
    <FunctionArgument  name="enableScroll" type="function" description="Call this function to enable scroll." />
</FunctionArguments>

  guidelines={["Use this hook when you want block users scroll."]}
